SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTR(RESULT.PRJ_DIVISION, 1, 1), '-', RESULT.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_DIVISION_ID , RESULT.PRJ_DIVISION , RESULT.PRJ_ID , RESULT.PRJ_NAME , RESULT.PRJ_VERSION , RESULT.STATUS , RESULT.STAGE , RESULT.OSS_NOTICE_DUE_DATE , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE RESULT.CREATOR = USER_ID), RESULT.CREATOR) AS CREATOR , RESULT.CREATED_DATE , RESULT.STAGE , RESULT.MODIFIER , RESULT.MODIFIED_DATE , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE RESULT.REVIEWER = USER_ID), RESULT.REVIEWER) AS REVIEWER_NAME , RESULT.REVIEWER AS REVIEWER , RESULT.PRIORITY FROM (
SELECT 'PRJ' AS PRJ_DIVISION , T1.PRJ_ID , T1.PRJ_NAME , T1.PRJ_VERSION , CASE WHEN T1.COMPLETE_YN = 'Y' AND STATUS_REQUEST_YN = 'N' THEN 'COMP' WHEN T1.DROP_YN = 'Y' AND STATUS_REQUEST_YN = 'N' THEN 'DROP' WHEN T1.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'REV' OR T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'REV' THEN 'REV' WHEN T1.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'REQ' OR T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'REQ' OR STATUS_REQUEST_YN = 'Y' THEN 'REQ' WHEN T1.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'DONE' THEN 'REV' WHEN T1.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'NA' THEN 'REV' WHEN T1.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'NA' AND T1.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'NA' THEN 'REV' ELSE 'PROG' END STATUS , CASE WHEN T1.STATUS_REQUEST_YN = 'Y' THEN 'B' WHEN T1.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS != 'NA' AND T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS IN ('CONF', 'NA') THEN 'D' WHEN T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS IS NOT NULL OR (T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS IS NULL AND T1.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF') THEN 'P' ELSE 'I' END STAGE , T1.OSS_NOTICE_DUE_DATE , T1.CREATOR , T1.CREATED_DATE , T1.MODIFIER , T1.MODIFIED_DATE , T1.REVIEWER , T1.PRIORITY FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (IFNULL(T1.COMPLETE_YN, '') <> 'Y' OR T1.STATUS_REQUEST_YN = 'Y')
AND ( T1.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT A1.PRJ_ID, A1.DIVISION, A2.USER_ID FROM PROJECT_WATCHER A1 INNER JOIN T2_USERS A2 ON A1.DIVISION = A2.DIVISION AND A2.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} WHERE A1.PRJ_ID = T1.PRJ_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = A2.USER_ID OR A1.USER_ID = 'all') ) )
AND ( T1.REVIEWER = #{loginUserName} OR IFNULL(T1.REVIEWER, '') = '' )
UNION ALL
